name: Courgetti Puttanesca
author: thelondoner.me
ingredients:
- 1 tbsp olive oil
- 4 anchovies (15g)
- 2 cloves garlic, chopped
- 1 tbsp capers
- 1 tsp chili flakes
- 400g tinned chopped tomatoes
- 2 tbsp chopped parsley
- 650g (~3) courgettes, spiralized
- 10g parmesan
- 50g pitted olives, sliced
instructions:
- Heat the oil and mix in the anchovies
- Add the garlic for a few minutes
- Add the chili flakes, capers and olives for a few minutes
- Add the tomatoes, bring to a simmer
- Add the courgetti, put a lid on top to steam
- Serve with grated parmesan and the parsley
